channel.title: And peace and normality finally returns to RuneScape
channel.description: Well, they banned SwiftSwitch, it is now legal again due to so much ranting and a huge riot. Zezima fell 11 places, he now returns to his normal number 1 spot. For now everything is back to normal in the RuneScape world. ;)

item.title: And peace and normality finally returns to RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

why would i waste my money on a game like that?

To shit-talk Andrew Gower in the forums, didn’t I just explain?

Read full topic

item.title: And peace and normality finally returns to RuneScape

item.description:

PaulT:

[quote]lol sexual root… why doesnt he have horses in RS then?

why would i waste my money on a game like that?

item.title: And peace and normality finally returns to RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @Blackester Blackester
item.description:
@Blackester wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:9, topic:43479”]Well, killing chickens within itself is not disturbing. When my dad was a little kid he had to kill a chicken for dinner. He smacked it in the neck with an axe, but it kept running around, spurting blood. He eventually guided it into the house, locked it in the bathroom, where it ran around in circles spurting blood everywhere for over 2 hours. It finally died, but my dad was too freaked out to fuck with it, so when his parents came home they were pretty pissed.

Anyway, I’m pretty sure Andrew Gowers hate for farm animals has a more ahem sexual root.[/quote]

lol sexual root… why doesnt he have horses in RS then?

Read full topic
item.source: And peace and normality finally returns to RuneScape

item.title: And peace and normality finally returns to RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Well, killing chickens within itself is not disturbing. When my dad was a little kid he had to kill a chicken for dinner. He smacked it in the neck with an axe, but it kept running around, spurting blood. He eventually guided it into the house, locked it in the bathroom, where it ran around in circles spurting blood everywhere for over 2 hours. It finally died, but my dad was too freaked out to fuck with it, so when his parents came home they were pretty pissed.

Anyway, I’m pretty sure Andrew Gowers hate for farm animals has a more ahem sexual root.

Read full topic
